WorkItem.ClosedComment: Your system's DPI settings are wrong, right-click the desktop select Properties then advanced on the Monitor section to change it to standard instead of Large.If you have this setting intentionally we can't help you as Rawr2 isn't designed for custom DPI settings. Rawr3 handles it by itself.
WorkItem.Description: I have always had a weird look to the home page of the RAWR program on my system.  Is there something that I can do to change this?  The window doesn't seem to be "large" enough for the start page.  I am attaching a screen shot to show what i mean.  Any help/suggestions appreciated.

Comments.Message:
Vista or Win7?
What are your font size/dpi settings?
Win 7.0.  I did find my way into the dpi settings and it fixed the problem.  Thank you.  You mentioned Rawr 3.  Is that available?
If you're an EJ Benefactor, yes. If not, in a week or few, the public beta will begin.
